business_context.name: HealingPath
business_context.target_audience: Women seeking confidential, safe abortion services

design_requirements.image_type: Service page hero/detail image for abortion care

visual_style.aesthetic: Medical spa, calming, professional yet warm
visual_style.lighting: Soft, natural lighting with warm undertones

conversion_optimization.primary_message: Safe, confidential abortion care in a supportive environment

main_subject.type: Medical consultation or supportive healthcare environment
main_subject.description: Professional female healthcare provider in consultation setting or comfortable medical room
main_subject.attire: Clean medical attire or professional healthcare clothing

elements: Calming colors - teal and soft neutrals

final_prompt: Create a compassionate healthcare image showing a professional medical consultation environment for abortion care services. Feature a warm, caring female healthcare provider in a modern, comfortable medical room with soft teal and gold accents. The setting should feel safe, private, and supportive - like a high-end medical spa. Include comfortable consultation seating, soft natural lighting, and a clean, professional atmosphere that conveys safety and compassion without being clinical or intimidating. The overall mood should be supportive, professional, and judgment-free, emphasizing privacy and quality medical care.
